title: Choose pivot for largest moment of inertia

content.question: The sphere-rod combination can be pivoted about an axis that is perpendicular to the plane of the page and that passes through one of the five lettered points. Through which point should the axis pass for the moment of inertia of the sphere-rod combination about this axis to be greatest?

skill.text: 3.B: Apply an appropriate law, definition, theoretical relationship, or model to make a claim.
